Articles.Content: Using Probodobodyne, MechJeb, and stock parts, I have successfully started a satellite program called Project KERB-SAT. Orbiting on other sides of Kerbin in 90x300 km orbits are KERB-SATs 1 & 2. Peering down on the tropics, Luna orbits at a a 45 degrees. In the VAB, ELI 1 (named after my brother) will blast-off soon to a low orbit with a yet undetermined inclination. If you have any suggestions, take screen shots from all angles so I can see the satellites and maybe approve it.

[move][glow=red,2,300]UPDATE! UPDATE! UPDATE![/glow][/move]

The Tubman (Harriet Tubman) mission will land on Minmus and stay there for a while.

If you want you can download Tubman and try to land it on Minmus.

GRCO (Gamma-Ray Circumpolar Observatory) was successfully put in orbit to survey the sky in high-energy wave-lengths.

Volstok (Lake Volstok, Antarctica) was designed to observe the polar caps of Kerbin.
This is good downloading the TUBMAN now I already have something like the KERB-SAT though
